word.definition: A hall at a building’s entrance
examples: The office lobby was decorated with fresh flowers

word.definition: A long passage inside a building
examples: The corridor was lined with paintings.
She walked quickly down the corridor.

word.definition: An entrance hall in a house or theater
examples: Guests gathered in the foyer before the show.
The foyer was decorated with a grand chandelier.

story.title: The Skyline Hotel
story.narrator: Hi, it's Hiro here. Last week, I checked into the Skyline Hotel for a business trip.
paragraphs: I pushed open the glass doors and stepped into a lobby scented with fresh coffee and jasmine. Soft jazz music played in the background.
